metadata.title: CVE-2024-56729 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:smb: Initialize cfid->tcon before performing network opsAvoid leaking a tcon ref when a lease break races with opening thecached directory. Processing the leak break might take a reference tothe tcon in cached_dir_lease_break() and then fail to release the ref incached_dir_offload_close, since cfid->tcon is still NULL.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.11.0-17.17').
